snippet: The best of long-form journalism this week.
abstract: The best of long-form journalism this week.
lead_paragraph: Outlook magazine asks an important question this week: "Who Calls The Shots?" The article is about Mamata Banerjee, West Bengal chief minister and ruling coalition ally, opposing legislation pushed by the central government. The writers believe her strong stand has to do with building her profile as a robust regional leader and breaking free of whatever remains of her roots as a Congress politician.
